title: Clinic Website - Booking System
description: A comprehensive booking system for code websites with user authentication, booking management, and payment integration. Features include real-time availability checking and automated notifications.

title: Sips and Sweets - E-Commerce
description: The application features a categorized product catalog, a customer ordering system, and a secure admin dashboard for managing products, orders, and messages. RESTful API endpoints to support product filtering, order management, and contact submissions.

title: FlashBook - E-Book Website
description: Digital library platform for e-books with features like user profiles, book recommendations, reading progress tracking, and social reading features.
